prompt: {title: "An elephant bathing in a lake",description: "8k photograph of an elephant in a lake pouring water from its trunk over its head. {"title": "Golden Sunset Over Chipiona Beach","description": "A breathtaking view of the sun setting over the tranquil beaches.
